code: protected RouteBuilder createRouteBuilder() {     return new RouteBuilder() {          public void configure() {             from("direct:start").doTry().process(validator).setHeader("valid", constant(true)).doCatch(ValidationException.class).setHeader("valid", constant(false)).doFinally().setBody(body()).choice().when(header("valid").isEqualTo(true)).to("mock:valid").otherwise().to("mock:invalid").         }     }. }
